text.section: The County Commissioners shall solicit each organization listed in subsection (b) of this section before July 15, 1992, and before July 15 every 4th year thereafter, requesting that the organization recommend an appointee to the County Commissioners by August 1.

section.section: The County Commissioners shall appoint the Commission members recommended by each organization.

If any organization fails to recommend an appointee to the County Commissioners by August 1, the County Commissioners shall appoint a substitute citizen member to the Commission to serve through the following January 30.

A member of the Commission appointed under paragraph (1) or (2) of this subsection may not be:
An Allegany County official or an employee of Allegany County; or
An official or employee of any office studied by the Commission.
The County Commissioners shall make their appointments to the Commission final before September 30, 1992, and before September 30 every 4th year thereafter.

text.section: A member of the Commission may not receive compensation but is entitled to reimbursement for expenses as authorized by the County Commissioners.
From among its members, the Commission shall elect a chairman.
